summary: This is an email chain discussing the maximum sentence Ghislaine Maxwell could face, noting that the maximum sentences for the offenses were lower during the 1994-97 time period of the charges compared to the present.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain discussing the maximum sentence she could face for charges related to the 1994-97 time period.

events.title: Time period of charges
events.description: The time period referenced for the charges against Ghislaine Maxwell, during which the maximum sentences for the offenses were different and lower than at present.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated July 6, 2020, discussing Ghislaine Maxwell's potential maximum sentence.
It notes that the maximum sentences for the offenses were different and lower during the 1994-97 time period, which is the period of the charges.
The correspondence highlights a legal consideration regarding sentencing based on the laws in effect at the time of the alleged crimes.
